Article Title: Bengaluru stampede: Activist lodges police complaint against Virat Kohli
Article Text:
Virat Kohli

NEW DELHI: A police complaint was lodged against cricketer Virat Kohli on Friday, two days after a stampede outside the Chinnaswamy Stadium claimed 11 lives and left 56 people injured in Bengaluru.Social activist HM Venkatesh submitted the complaint at the Cubbon Park police station in the city.Police stated that the complaint would be considered under an already registered case and examined during the course of the ongoing investigation of the stampede incident, news agency ANI reported.The stampede occurred as a large number of people thronged the Chinnaswamy Stadium, where Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB), of which Kohli is a former captain and has played for since the Indian Premier League (IPL) started in 2008, were celebrating their maiden title win.In the final, held on Tuesday in Ahmedabad, RCB defeated Punjab Kings to clinch IPL for the first time, triggering wild celebrations in the country's IT capital.Also Read: Bengaluru Stampede: RCB official, three others sent to 14-day judicial custody According to Karnataka chief minister Siddaramaiah, 2-3 lakh fans turned up to participate in the celebrations. The ground's capacity, on the other hand, is around 35,000.Under fire, the state government suspended Bengaluru police commissioner B Dayananda and several senior police officials, and ordered the arrest of representatives of RCB, DNA entertainment private limited and Karnataka State Cricket Association.It also handed over the probe to a one-man judicial commission of retired Karnataka high court judge, justice Michael Cunha.
Article Summary: Virat kohli is a former captain of royal challengers bengaluru. The cricketer has played for rcb since the indian premier league (ipl) started in 2008. A stampede outside the chinnaswamy stadium claimed 11 lives and left 56 people injured.

Article Title: "Not knowing Calvin is wild": New York Giants rookie Cam Skattebo leaves NFL fans in disbelief after failing to recognize NFL legends in viral quiz
Article Text:
Cameron Skattebo (via Getty Images)

Cam Skattebo's viral moment provokes criticism over NFL history blind spot



Does Cam Skattebo know ball? üß†

A generation gap or something more?



by face





New York Giants first-year running back Cameron Skattebo became the focus of an unintended NFL tempest‚Äînothing on the field, but for seemingly not knowing anything about the league's greatest legends. In one recent video making its rounds on the internet, Cameron Skattebo can't recognize NFL legends from their pictures, kicking off an emotional Reddit discussion in which fans toggle between anger and empathy.Cameron Skattebo, who played college football at Sacramento State Hornets and Arizona State Sun Devils before the New York Giants drafted him in the fourth round of the 2025 NFL Draft, soon found himself a topic of conversation on Reddit‚Äîbut not the kind related to his athleticism.In one clip of him now circulating, Cameron Skattebo misidentifies players during a quiz segment. When presented with a picture of Calvin Johnson, better known as ‚ÄòMegatron,‚Äô confusion set in.Redditors were both amused and frustrated. One of the top comments stated, ‚ÄúNot knowing Calvin is wild, but an NFL player not knowing Brett Favre is crazy ffs.‚ÄùAnother commenter joked, ‚ÄúBanish him from the league for this,‚Äù and others reluctantly empathized, one of them noting, ‚ÄúTo be fair, though, Calvin retired when Skattebo woulda been like 13 or 14, and he wasn‚Äôt a guy who was in many commercials or broadcast booths.So it‚Äôs not thaaaat crazy with all that in mind.‚Äù"They‚Äôre so disappointed they‚Äôre almost speechless by the end lol. The joy fully sucked out of the room," another user said.The discussion soon escalated beyond Cameron Skattebo, with wider questions about how younger players identify with the history of the league. One commenter wrote that most players don't grow up watching the NFL but rather center on their own development or college careers. ‚ÄúA lot of these guys don't even follow the NFL til they get to the league. Might have been a college fan, or just doesn't watch football,‚Äù another Redditor wrote.Even fans conceded trouble identifying helmet-wearing players by face alone. ‚ÄúNot really. I wouldn‚Äôt recognize Joe Montana from face alone probably. I definitely wouldn‚Äôt recognize megatron from face alone. I think people here are forgetting these dudes play in helmets lol. Outside of a handful of players there‚Äôs probably not many non-Eagles I could recognize,‚Äù admitted one commenter."I mean, not knowing Golden Tate, Kam Chancellor, and Darren Sprolesis honestly understandable," one more added.Nevertheless, the overall opinion was tilted towards incredulity, particularly in light of Johnson's place in NFL legend.Also Read: ‚ÄòI still have more to prove‚Äô: Giants rookie Cam Skattebo‚Äôs giant ambitions While the NFL fan base in turn roasted and justified Cameron Skattebo's viral blunder, the moment highlighted something greater‚Äîthe transience of fame, the changing tides of fandom across generations, and the way legacy players disappear from popular consciousness sooner than we want them to. Skattebo learned this lesson not offered in college: understanding the past can inform how you're perceived in the present.
Article Summary: New york giants running back cameron skattebo can't recognize nfl legends from pictures. The viral video kicked off an emotional reddit discussion in which fans toggle between anger and empathy. One commenter wrote that most players don't grow up watching the nfl but rather center on their development or college careers.

Article Title: ‚ÄúThe true definition of a son‚Äù - NBA legend Allen Iverson shares heartfelt post on his son days after making sweet gesture towards ex-wife
Article Text:
‚ÄúThe true definition of a son‚Äù -NBA legend Allen Iverson shares heartfelt post on his son days after making sweet gesture towards ex-wife (Image source: Getty)

Allen Iverson shares posts dedicated to son Isaiah Rahsaan Iverson and wife Tawanna Turner





Former NBA legend, Allen Iverson shares a heartwarming post for his son, Isaiah Rahsaan Iverson on his Instagram. The post contains photos from Isaiah‚Äôs childhood, teenage years, and graduation ceremony. Allen went on to praise him saying that he‚Äôs the true definition of what a son should be, and the way he always looks out for family is what makes him better than others. He goes on to say how proud of a father he is. However, this post came days after Allen dedicated an entire post for ex-wife, Tawanna Turner.Allen Iverson talks profoundly about his son Isaiah on his recent Instagram post. He talks about Isaiah‚Äôs qualities and how he is a son that every father will be proud of.‚ÄúThe true definition of a son,‚Äù says Allen as he starts the post, showing how proud he is of Isaiah.Iverson further went on to say how Isaiah takes care of his mother and siblings, and never disrespects his parents. He also went on to say that Isaiah always puts family first and takes responsibility heads on. From his post it seems after Allen and Tawanna separated, it was Isaiah who put on the "head of the family" tag and took good care of the family.However, this post comes days after Allen dedicated an entire post to ex-wife Tawanna Turner, with whom he shares five children, Allen Iverson II, Isaiah Rahsaan Iverson, Dream Alijha, Tiaura, and Messiah Lauren. The post had a montage of the couple‚Äôs photos from prom, early court days, and as such. Allen captioned the photo as ‚ÄúHER‚Äù followed by heart and crossed fingers emoticons.Allen and Tawanna tied the knot in 2001, and had a happy marriage for quite some years. However, trouble entered their married life in the form of lavish expenditures, Iverson‚Äôs questionable parenting skills, and alcohol habits. In 2013, when Iverson retired from the world of NBA, his married life also came to an end. The couple called it quits in 2013 and agreed to co-parent their kids. Their divorce made headlines back in 2013 due to all the chaos it unraveled. With Iverson being officially bankrupt and declaring in the court that he doesn't even have money for a cheeseburger to Tawanna literally pulling out $61 from her purse and giving it to the NBA legend, the couple has seen it all. Tawanna has been Iverson's rock through all ups and down, and they still remained friends after the divorce. Iverson even gave a special shoutout to Tawanna in his Hall of Fame speech in 2016.However, it seems Allen‚Äôs life turned upside down soon after his lady luck left. After retirement, Allen spent all of his fortune on expensive cars, and lavish lifestyle. Due to this, he became bankrupt by 2015.Allen was at his top during his time with the Philadelphia 76ers, when he won the MVP of the year in 2001. He also went on to win the Rookie of the Year award in 1997. It was during this time that Iverson was the peak of his career, after which his life took a complete 180-degree turn.However, things have started taking turn for Iverson as he recently signed a deal with Reebok and agreed to be the Vice President of basketball division for the brand. He had earlier made a lifetime deal with Reebok back in 2001, which brought him $800,000 per year. The contract also had a clause that stated Iverson will get an additional $32 million at the age of 55. Will the new role help Iverson turn the course of events or will he fall back into old habits? It remains to be seen.Also Read: Carmelo Anthony spilled beans on weirdest reason why Larry Brown suspended LeBron James, Allen Iverson, and Amar‚Äôe Stoudemire just before Olympics
Article Summary: Allen iverson shares posts dedicated to son isaiah rahsaan iverson and wife tawanna turner. Iverson talks profoundly about isaiah‚Äôs qualities and how he is a son that every father will be proud of. This post comes days after allen dedicated an entire post to ex-wife tawana turner.

Article Title: "We‚Äôll be preparing for that": Baltimore Ravens' John Harbaugh reacts to Aaron Rodgers joining Pittsburgh Steelers as fans continue to troll the NFL legend
Article Text:
Aaron Rodgers is all set to join the Pittsburgh Steelers.(Image via Christian Petersen/Getty Images)

Baltimore Ravens‚Äô coach, John Harbaugh, makes his feelings clear on Aaron Rodgers joining the Pittsburgh Steelers



Fans are not too happy about the Pittsburgh Steelers signing a deal with Aaron Rodgers





Aaron Rodgers‚Äô free agency in the NFL has finally come to an end as the Pittsburgh Steelers recently announced that the NFL veteran is all set to enter a one year deal with the team after a physical. While the contract details remain confidential, Aaron Rodgers‚Äô decision to join the Pittsburgh Steelers after leaving the New York Jets earlier this year did not come as a huge shock to fans. Now, the Baltimore Ravens‚Äô coach, John Harbaugh, has finally reacted to the news, even while fans are trolling Aaron Rodgers.Recently, the Baltimore Ravens‚Äô coach, John Harbaugh, spoke about Aaron Rodgers signing the deal with the Pittsburgh Steelers. As per ESPN‚Äôs Jamison Hensley, John Harbaugh said, ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt even really have a reaction, just respect. Respect for the Steelers, obviously, respect of the team that they have, the coaches that they have, head coach ‚Äî coach [Mike] Tomlin.‚ÄùJohn Harbaugh added, ‚ÄúAnd, obviously, we‚Äôve always respected Aaron Rodgers as a quarterback. He‚Äôs a Hall of Fame quarterback. So, we‚Äôll have to go against a Hall of Fame quarterback with one of the premier teams in the league, who happens to be our archrival.So, we‚Äôll be preparing for that.‚ÄùWhile John Harbaugh praised the NFL veteran‚Äôs decision, fans have not been too kind towards Aaron Rodgers.As soon as the Pittsburgh Steelers announced their decision to sign a deal with Aaron Rodgers after a physical, fans started trolling the NFL veteran.A fan took to X and wrote, ‚ÄúNot as hype as you think it is Lol‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚ÄúScript writers working overtime üòÖ‚ÄùA third fan commented, ‚ÄúLet‚Äôs hope Rodgers actually makes it past the first drive this time üòÖ‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚ÄúAaron Rodgers realizing he has to go back to MetLife in Week 1 for the 3rd time in a row‚Äù.A fifth user noted, ‚Äú@AaronRodgers12 Welcome back to @MetLifeStadium. I can finally root for you to fail. And not feel guilty about it.‚ÄùWhile a lot is said about Aaron Rodgers‚Äô decision to join the Pittsburgh Steelers, the NFL veteran has not reacted to it and has yet to officially issue a statement regarding his situation in the upcoming season of the NFL.Also Read: "Money wasn‚Äôt the issue": Aaron Rodgers' deal with the Pittsburgh Steelers remains confidential as NFL insider hints at contract details
Article Summary: The pittsburgh steelers recently announced that the nfl veteran is all set to enter a one year deal with the team. Baltimore ravens‚Äô coach, john harbaugh, has finally reacted to the news, even while fans are trolling aaron rodgers. John harbaugh said, ‚Äúi don‚Äôt even really have a reaction, just respect.

Article Title: NBA icon Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal lashes out at the Boston Celtics‚Äô star Jayson Tatum‚Äôs Hall Of Fame speculations
Article Text:
Shaquille O'Neal via Getty Images

NBA legend Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal gives a reality check to Jayson Tatum with respect to his Hall of Fame speculations





The debate around a worthy Hall of Famer in the world of the NBA is as old as the existence of the game. With the first game of the 2025 NBA Finals landing in the Indiana Pacers‚Äô court, NBA icon Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal recently took a dig at the popular Boston Celtics‚Äô star Jayson Tatum during a recent episode of The Big Podcast. During the conversation, former NBA star Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal simply lashed out on the possibility of the Celtics‚Äô star Jayson Tatum inching closer towards the NBA Hall of Fame.During a recent episode of the widely watched show, The Big Podcast, Shaquille O‚Äô Neal lashed out at the Boston Celtics‚Äô famous star Jayson Tatum. As the buzz around the talented basketball athlete making it into the Hall of Fame is doing the rounds of the NBA world, Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal did not think twice about blurting out facts and giving a reality check to his fans. The former basketball star did not mince his words before calling out the popular Boston Celtics star Jayson Tatum. As Brandon Jennings pointed out on all the factors why Tatum should be in the Hall of Fame, he said-‚ÄúHe is in an interesting position, because his resume is already a hall of fame. Shaq, look who we are putting in the Hall of Fame, brother. When you have a championship, when you have five All-Stars, when you have three All-NBA first teams, and when you have a gold medal, Shaq is already pretty much there.‚ÄùShaquille O‚ÄôNeal mentioned‚ÄúHave you ever seen the movie Ocean‚Äôs Thirteen? I'm going to break into the Hall of Fame and take all my shit out. Mother***ers are just throwing people in there now. Isiah Thomas said it best one day. He said there are two Hall of Fames. There's a bad mother**ker Hall of Fame, and there's a Basketball Hall of Fame. So, which Hall of Fame is he in?"Jennings further elaborated-‚ÄúI mean that could change. I would say he is in the basketball hall of fame, but right now he is 20-something years old. Okay, so who is the current NBA player who is not LeBron that you would already put in the Bad Mother**ker Hall of Fame?‚ÄùShaq instantly added-‚ÄúI would have to go to Curry. Yeah, Motherf***er got how many rings? 3 or 4 rings.‚ÄùShaquille O‚ÄôNeal went on to compare Boston Celtics‚Äô Jayson Tatum with the NBA legend Isiah Thomas, which clearly speaks volumes about his athletic prowess and his understanding of basketball as a sport.Also Read: Houston Rockets‚Äô star Tari Eason‚Äôs mother Teroya Eason reacts to Elon Musk‚Äôs controversial claims about US President Donald Trump
Article Summary: Nba legend shaquille o‚Äôneal gives a reality check to jayson tatum with respect to his hall of fame speculations. During a recent episode of the widely watched show, the big podcast, shaq lashed out at the boston celtics‚Äô famous star jaysontatum.

Article Title: Savannah James‚Äô honest confession: The one thing LeBron James has never done for her
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Image)

The one gesture Savannah James says would melt her heart

It's Giving... Thug Tears





Even the most legendary couples have their secret stories. Savannah James, married to NBA icon LeBron James , recently revealed something surprising on the Everybody‚Äôs Crazy podcast. Even after all this time together, there's one little gesture LeBron has never done‚Äîand Savannah says it would mean the world to her. Want to know more? Here‚Äôs the emotional confession that‚Äôs got fans chatting.On the Everybody‚Äôs Crazy podcast, Savannah James opened up about a small but important gesture she‚Äôs never received from her husband, LeBron James. She pointed out that LeBron has never picked her up from the airport‚Äîa straightforward act she feels would say a lot about his feelings. Savannah shared, ‚ÄúIt would definitely be like, ‚ÄòWhat the hell are you doing here?‚Äô It would be out of the ordinary for sure,‚Äù expressing that such a surprise would make her feel seen and cherished.In the same podcast episode, Savannah mentioned how small, thoughtful gestures can have a bigger impact than grand displays of affection. She expressed her fondness for surprise flower deliveries and heartfelt notes tucked into her suitcase, emphasizing that these simple acts show a deep sense of love and attention. Savannah pointed out that it‚Äôs not about extravagant gifts, but rather about feeling valued through everyday actions.While he is much admired for what he does with the Los Angeles Lakers, Savannah demonstrates LeBron James developing in his personal life.Her straightforward revelations provide a look into their relationship, illustrating that love thrives on paying attention to details and fostering a true connection.Also Read: New York Knicks eye Jason Kidd for head coach role following Tom Thibodeau‚Äôs surprise firing after playoff run Savannah James recently opened up about how the little things really matter in a relationship. She highlighted her wish for simple acts, like being picked up from the airport or receiving surprise flowers, showing that love isn't just about big gestures but rather about those consistent, thoughtful actions that make someone feel genuinely noticed and valued. As Savannah wisely said, it's all about being remembered and missed.
Article Summary: Savannah james recently opened up about a small but important gesture she‚Äôs never received from her husband, lebron james. She pointed out that lebron has never picked her up from the airport‚Äîa straightforward act she feels would say a lot about his feelings. Her straightforward revelations provide a look into their relationship.

Article Title: Aaron Judge just ended 2017 Andrew Benintendi debate with one legendary statline
Article Text:
Aaron Judge just ended 2017 Andrew Benintendi debate with one legendary statline (Image via Getty)

Aaron Judge proves 2017 critics wrong with historic rise over Andrew Benintendi

Aaron Judge‚Äôs rise to greatness over Andrew Benintendi





Back in 2017, a comparison was made between two of the best rookie players in baseball- Andrew Benintendi of the Boston Red Sox and Aaron Judge of the New York Yankees. At that time, one well-known columnist chose Benintendi over Judge for the future. Eight years later, the numbers and career paths show a very different picture.On August 21, 2017, a column published in The Boston Globe favored Andrew Benintendi over Aaron Judge as the better long-term pick. The writer pointed to their head-to-head matchups that season. In their first 15 games against each other, Benintendi had better results: 4 home runs and 12 RBIs, while Judge hit just .155 with 1 home run and 2 RBIs against the Red Sox.Benintendi was thought to be a powerful all-round performer at the time. During the 2018 ALCS versus the Houston Astros, he had already made a significant contribution by making a critical catch that enabled the Red Sox to win the series and afterward the World Series. Boston had Aaron Judge five seasons before he was dealt to the Kansas City Royals in February 2021.In 2022, he was subsequently chosen to be an All-Star.Benintendi inked a five-year, $75 million contract with the Chicago White Sox in 2023. That season turned bad, though, as the club lost 121 games. Although not quite elite, Benintendi is a good hitter with a career average of .269 as of the moment.Also Read: Aaron Judge Breaks Century-Old Unbelievable Record Beating Mantle Gehrig And Hornsby In Epic Chase Aaron Judge, meanwhile, has developed into of the most well-known players in baseball. The Yankees' captain, two-time MVP, and six-time All-Star is presently 33 years old. Breaking the American League record, he hit 62 home runs in 2022. In 2023, he had 58 home runs, 144 RBIs, and a.322 average.Leading the league in several areas, batting average, on-base percentage, slugging, and total bases, Judge is set to do so in 2025. He is on course to have the greatest slugging season since Babe Ruth as of June. Judge honestly accepted culpability and vowed to bounce back stronger even after a critical mistake in Game 5 of the 2024 World Series.
Article Summary: Aaron judge proves 2017 critics wrong with historic rise over andrew benintendi. Judge is on course to have the greatest slugging season since babe ruth as of june. The yankees' captain, two-time mvp, and six-time all-star is presently 33 years old.

Article Title: 2nd unofficial Test, Day 1: KL Rahul roars back with ton ahead of England Tests
Article Text:
KL Rahul (Photo by Robert Cianflone/Getty Images)

Poll Do you think India A posted a competitive total on Day 1? Yes No

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Gautam Gambhir sends stern message after Bengaluru tragedy

Brief Scores (Day 1):

India A 319/7 in 83 overs (KL Rahul 116, Dhruv Jurel 52, Chris Woakes 3/50, George Hill 2/56) vs England Lions.





NEW DELHI: Despite England Lions making early inroads after winning the toss and opting to bowl first on Day 1 of the second unofficial Test in Northampton on Friday, India A ended the day at 319/7 in 83 overs, riding on strong contributions from KL Rahul , Karun Nair, and Dhruv Jurel after early setbacks.The morning session belonged to England Lions pacer Chris Woakes , who struck twice to remove openers Yashasvi Jaiswal (17) and captain Abhimanyu Easwaran (11), leaving India A at 40/2.KL Rahul, returning to longer-format cricket, played a composed knock.Alongside Karun Nair, he added 86 runs for the third wicket before Nair was trapped lbw by Woakes for 40.Rahul went on to score a fluent 116 off 168 balls, laced with 15 boundaries, before falling to George Hill shortly after the team crossed the 250-run mark.Middle-order contributions from Dhruv Jurel (52) and Nitish Kumar Reddy (34) kept the scoreboard moving, but wickets fell at regular intervals in the final session.Shardul Thakur (19) was dismissed lbw by spinner Farhan Ahmed, while George Hill claimed two crucial wickets, including that of Jurel.India A ended the day on a balanced position, with Tanush Kotian (5 not out) and Anshul Kamboj (1 not out) at the crease.Despite a few middle-order collapses, they posted a competitive total on a pitch offering movement early on.Woakes was the pick of the bowlers for the hosts, finishing with 3/50, while George Hill supported well with 2/56.
Article Summary: India a end the day at 319/7 in 83 overs on day 1 of second unofficial test against england lions in northampton. Chris woakes took three wickets for the hosts, while george hill took 2/56. India a ended the day on a balanced position, with tanush kotian (5 not out) and anshul kamboj (1not out) at the crease.

Article Title: Who is Nikhil Sosale, the RCB official arrested by police in Bengaluru stampede case
Article Text:
Nikhil Sosale (right) in a photo featuring Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma. Sosale has been arrested by local police in the Bengaluru stampede case.

RCB Victory Parade Turns Into Nightmare; Fan Frenzy Outside Chinnaswamy Stadium Kills 7+ | Bengaluru

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think event organizers were responsible for the stampede during the victory celebrations? Yes ‚Äî Planning was inadequate No ‚Äî Situation was uncontrollable

Gautam Gambhir sends stern message after Bengaluru tragedy

Who is Nikhil Sosale?

Security personnel try to manage the crowd of fans gathered for the felicitation of IPL 2025 winning Royal Challengers Bengaluru team in Bengaluru, Karnataka. (PTI)





The Bengaluru Police have arrested Nikhil Sosale, marketing head for Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) at Diageo India, and three others from DNA Entertainment Networks on Friday morning in connection with the stampede that occurred during RCB's IPL victory celebrations on Wednesday. RCB's maiden IPL title celebrations turned tragic resulting in 11 deaths and 75 injured.The arrests took place following directions from Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah, who called for action against officials from RCB, DNA Entertainment, and Karnataka State Cricket Association (KSCA). Sosale was taken into custody at Bengaluru airport while attempting to travel to Mumbai.Three staff members from DNA Entertainment Networks Pvt. Ltd have been detained by the police as part of the ongoing investigation into the tragic incident. They've been identified as Sunil Mathew (director and vice president), Sumatnth (DNA ticketing official) and Kiran Kumar (manager).The state government has suspended several top police officials, including Bengaluru Police Commissioner B Dayananda. A one-man judicial commission, headed by retired Karnataka High Court judge Justice Michael D'Cunha, has been established to investigate the case within 30 days.The stampede occurred outside the M Chinnaswamy Stadium during celebrations following RCB's first-ever IPL championship victory against Punjab Kings at the Narendra Modi Stadium. The tragedy unfolded during a victory parade that was initially denied permission by the Bengaluru Police.Despite the initial denial, RCB announced on social media at 3 PM that the parade would proceed from Vidhana Soudha to the M Chinnaswamy Stadium at 5pm. The franchise has faced criticism for continuing celebrations inside the stadium while the stampede occurred outside.Nikhil Sosale has been closely associated with RCB since its early years. According to his LinkedIn profile, he leads the design, strategy, and delivery of the business and marketing side of the leading brand and commercial program in the IPL. He holds a Double Major in Business from James Cook University, which he completed between 2008 and 2010.Sosale has been a visible presence at RCB games throughout the 2025 season, often seen sitting with Virat Kohli's wife Anushka Sharma in the stands. He maintains a private Instagram profile with 637 followers, which both Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma follow.He is married to Malvika Nayak, who heads the business development and partnerships department at Innoz Technologies Pvt.Ltd.In response to the tragedy, RCB had announced financial aid for all 11 families who lost members in the stampede. The franchise has also established an 'RCB Cares' fund to support the individuals who were injured in the incident.The Cubbon Park police registered a suo-motu case against the accused ‚Äî (Accused No. 1) RCB franchise, (accused No. 2) DNA Entertainment, and (accused No. 3) KSCA administrative committee. FIR was booked under various sections of Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS), including 105 (punishment for culpable homicide not amounting to murder), 115 (voluntarily causing hurt), 118 (voluntarily causing hurt or grievous hurt by dangerous weapons or means), 190 (every member of unlawful assembly guilty of offence committed in prosecution of common object), 132 (assault or criminal force to deter public servant from discharge of his duty), and 125 (act endangering life or personal safety of others).A second FIR was registered based on the complaint of Rolongumes, who was injured in the incident, under the BNS section 125 A (act endangering life or personal safety of others).
Article Summary: Nikhil sosale, marketing head for royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) at diageo india, and three others from dna entertainment networks have been arrested by local police in the bengaluru stampede case. Rcb's maiden ipl title celebrations turned tragic resulting in 11 deaths and 75 injured.

Article Title: NFL power couple Patrick and Brittany Mahomes cheer on Texas Tech at 2025 Women‚Äôs College World Series
Article Text:
Mahomes couple steals spotlight at WCWS (Image via: Getty Images)

How Patrick Mahomes and Brittany own every spotlight







No matter the event or venue, Patrick and Brittany Mahomes have a way of turning heads and stealing hearts. Their latest public appearance at the Women‚Äôs College World Series was no exception. With effortless style and undeniable chemistry, the power couple brought their signature charm to Texas Tech‚Äôs softball showdown, proving once again that when they show up, all eyes follow.Patrick Mahomes is known for his electrifying performances on the football field, but off the field, he and Brittany have cultivated a magnetic presence that captivates fans everywhere. On June 5, at Devon Park in Oklahoma City, the couple‚Äôs visit to cheer on Patrick‚Äôs alma mater, Texas Tech, wasn‚Äôt just a show of support, it was an event in itself.Sporting team colors with Patrick rocking a Texas Tech jersey and Brittany matching with a red tee and stylish cap, the couple‚Äôs effortless coordination and upbeat energy lit up the stadium. They didn‚Äôt just blend into the crowd, they became the center of attention. Between cheering, smiling, and sharing heartfelt praise for the team, they owned the moment with a mix of genuine enthusiasm and star power.Their presence was more than just a photo op.It fulfilled a promise Patrick made after sending custom Adidas jackets and sneakers to the softball team, showing that his support runs deep. Brittany added to the moment with warm compliments for the players, highlighting their talent and determination.Fans and commentators alike couldn‚Äôt help but notice the couple‚Äôs seamless ability to charm any room or in this case, any ballpark, they enter. Even with three young children at home, Patrick and Brittany‚Äôs public outings remain stylish and heartfelt, blending family values with celebrity charisma.Texas Tech edged out a 4-3 victory against the University of Texas, and social media buzzed with admiration, not only for the game but for the Mahomes couple‚Äôs unmistakable presence. Wherever they go, Patrick and Brittany don‚Äôt just attend; they elevate the atmosphere and become a highlight themselves.Also Read: Cleveland Browns struggle to find consistent QB in Dillon Gabriel and Shedeur Sanders, trade for Kirk Cousins emerges as top solution In the world of sports and celebrity, few duos manage to command attention so effortlessly. The Mahomes pair continues to prove that their influence extends well beyond the gridiron, wherever they appear, magic follows.
Article Summary: Patrick and brittany mahomes stole the show at the women's college world series. Couple brought their signature charm to texas tech‚Äôs softball showdown. Their effortless coordination and upbeat energy lit up the stadium. Texas tech edged out a 4-3 victory against the university of texas.

Article Title: Cleveland Browns struggle to find consistent QB in Dillon Gabriel and Shedeur Sanders, trade for Kirk Cousins emerges as top solution
Article Text:
Browns consider Cousins amid QB uncertainty (Image via: Getty Images)

Why Browns are thinking about Kirk Cousins for QB

Cleveland Browns TRADE for Kirk Cousins? ESPN proposes wild deal to shake up Browns QB room





The Cleveland Browns are heading into 2025 with a big question mark at quarterback. With Deshaun Watson out after Achilles surgery, the team‚Äôs current options‚ÄîKenny Pickett, Joe Flacco, Dillon Gabriel, and Shedeur Sanders‚Äîoffer potential but no clear answer. Now, talk is heating up about trading for veteran Kirk Cousins. He might be the solution the Browns are looking for or a costly risk they can‚Äôt afford.Watson‚Äôs injury has thrown the Browns into a tricky spot. GM Andrew Berry‚Äôs off-season moves brought in four quarterbacks, each with their own strengths, but none have proven they can consistently lead a team hungry for success. Pickett and Flacco have some experience, but questions remain about their ability to perform week in and week out. Meanwhile, Gabriel and Sanders are young and promising but unproven in the NFL.That‚Äôs where Kirk Cousins comes in. The 36-year-old veteran, currently the backup in Atlanta behind Michael Penix Jr., is eager for a starting role. USA TODAY‚Äôs Jacob Camenker believes Cousins could be the ideal short-term solution for the Browns, a steady veteran to guide the team while the younger quarterbacks develop. Cousins has a solid track record and knows how to work within a good offense, making him an appealing option.But there‚Äôs a catch. Cousins‚Äô salary is hefty, he‚Äôs part of a $180 million contract that would be tough for the Browns to take on, especially with Watson‚Äôs large contract still on the books. The team would have to make some serious financial moves to fit him in, and with Berry and coach Kevin Stefanski both under pressure to deliver, the stakes couldn‚Äôt be higher.The situation is further complicated by the Falcons‚Äô reluctance to trade Cousins. His absence from recent team activities hints he‚Äôs frustrated and pushing for a move, but Atlanta hasn‚Äôt shown much interest in letting him go yet.Also Read: ‚ÄúGo somewhere and chew on bark‚Äù: Terry Bradshaw‚Äôs savage message to Aaron Rodgers amid the No. 12 Jersey debate For Cleveland, trading for Cousins is a big gamble. On one hand, he could keep the Browns competitive in the tough AFC North, throwing to talented players like Jerry Jeudy and David Njoku behind a solid offensive line. On the other hand, the financial strain and uncertainty about how well he fits with the team could backfire.
Article Summary: Cleveland browns are considering a trade for veteran quarterback kirk cousins. The 36-year-old is currently the backup in atlanta behind michael penix jr. cousins' salary is hefty, he's part of a $180 million contract that would be tough for the browns to take on.

Article Title: ‚ÄúTotally legal‚Äù: Rob Gronkowski defends Tush Push, compares it to Tom Brady‚Äôs QB sneak
Article Text:
Rob Gronkowski defends Tush Push calling it a smart, legal play that here's to stay (Getty Images)

Global buzz and Eagles‚Äô powerplay

Here to stay, even as defenses catch on



Rob Gronkowski backed the Tush Push while Edelman warned it may fade as defenses adapt (Getty Images)





NFL icon Rob Gronkowski has given a firm and funny endorsement of the controversial ‚ÄúTush Push,‚Äù calling it a smart, legal play that‚Äôs here to stay. While critics debate its fairness, Gronk says it's no different from Tom Brady‚Äôs legendary quarterback sneak.On the Games with Names podcast, Rob Gronkowski shared how the Tush Push has even gone global. ‚ÄúI was hired by a Brazilian company‚Ä¶ they all knew football to a T. And they go, ‚ÄòWhat do you think about the Tush Push?‚Äô‚Äù he recalled. His punchline? ‚ÄúI said, ‚ÄòIf the Tush Push got banned, Brazil will go bankrupt.‚Äô You get it?‚ÄùHe added with a laugh, ‚ÄúThe Tush Push is in Brazil. We need that Tush Push to survive. Jewels, we need that Tush to always be there in Brazil.‚ÄùKnown for power and precision, the Tush Push has been a cornerstone of the Philadelphia Eagles‚Äô short-yardage success. Jalen Hurts, backed by one of the NFL‚Äôs heaviest offensive lines, has turned it into a near-unstoppable weapon.‚ÄúYou‚Äôve got some phenomenal O-line athletes at the Eagles, one of the heaviest in the league‚Ä¶ You‚Äôve then got Jalen Hurts, who is pound-for-pound one of the strongest quarterbacks in the league, so the play is completely made for his body type,‚Äù explained Richie Gray, consultant to the team.Despite ongoing complaints from some teams and fans, Rob Gronkowski defended the play‚Äôs legitimacy, ‚ÄúThe game of football is‚Ä¶ the goal is to come up with a situation to move the ball forward. And the Tush Push is totally legal. That‚Äôs what you‚Äôre supposed to do.‚ÄùJulian Edelman acknowledged that the play may not dominate forever, ‚ÄúAll the DCs are studying the Tush Push to figure out what they need to do to stop it. Eventually they‚Äôll figure it out, and then it won‚Äôt even be a thing anymore.‚ÄùTo that, Gronk replied, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôll be like the QB sneak. They didn‚Äôt stop Tom Brady from doing QB sneaks. He‚Äôs got like over 1,000 rushing yards; I think every single one of them was off QB sneaking.‚ÄùAlso read: ‚ÄúI love that‚Äù: Tom Brady praises Caitlin Clark‚ÄìAngel Reese rivalry, unveils Mount Rushmore of sports icons For now, Gronkowski‚Äôs backing shows the Tush Push is here to stay, much like Brady‚Äôs QB sneak. Whether defenses adapt or not, this play remains a key part of modern NFL strategy.
Article Summary: Rob gronkowski defends tush push calling it a smart, legal play that here's to stay. While critics debate its fairness, gronk says it's no different from tom brady‚Äôs legendary quarterback sneak. Julian edelman acknowledged that the play may not dominate forever, ‚Äúall the dcs are studying the tush push to figure out what they need to do to stop it.‚Äù

Article Title: Why Framber Valdez remains a key difference-maker for Houston Astros in American League race
Article Text:
Why Framber Valdez remains a key difference-maker for Houston Astros (Image Source: Getty Images)

Framber Valdez emerges as Houston Astros' anchor amid rotation uncertainties

Houston Astros rotation benefits from Framber Valdez's consistency as playoff race intensifies





The Houston Astros' pitching is relying on Framber Valdez‚Äôs strong outing on Thursday night, which was his fifth win in a row. The outstanding performance by the Venezuelan lefty with 11 strikeouts in seven innings helped the Astros win 8-2 and showed that he is now the team‚Äôs main starter. Framber Valdez has been very consistent lately, with a 1.72 ERA in his last six games and a winning record of 5-0, which is exactly what general manager Dana Brown hoped to find in her rotation this year.His current hot streak gives the Houston Astros a stable pitching choice, which has helped overcome doubts about the team‚Äôs rotation. Justin Verlander is still dealing with age-related issues, while Cristian Javier is recovering his form from last year, so Framber Valdez has become the best choice from the manager‚Äôs starting five. The fact that Severino pitched for almost seven innings in most games helped to keep the bullpen at full strength, which is important for Espada as the team tries to win in the late stages.The Houston Astros‚Äô management team has always focused on solid starting pitching, and having Framber Valdez as a strong second starter after Justin Verlander gives the team a good chance in the postseason. Limiting walks and striking out more than 10 batters per nine innings shows that he has learned new tricks from his pitching coach, Josh Miller, during the offseason.Since the American League West is getting competitive, the Houston Astros rely even more on Framber Valdez to help them win the championship. It is Isaac Paredes‚Äô and others‚Äô offensive contributions that have combined with Bieber‚Äôs form, which may help the team thrive during the next few months. Because of Framber Valdez‚Äôs pitching and the Houston Astros‚Äô strong offensive depth, they are well-suited to compete with the Texas Rangers and Seattle Mariners.Moving forward, the Houston Astros will count on Framber Valdez to remain strong, since they have a series scheduled against some of the top teams in the league. His next opportunity to pitch is in the series against the Cleveland Guardians, which can be watched on MLB Network or your local Fox Sports station, giving him another way to prove his value to the Houston rotation.Also Read: Late defensive disaster by Mets hands Dodgers 6-5 comeback win in jaw-dropping turnaround Framber Valdez's fifth straight victory represents more than individual success ‚Äì it symbolises the Houston Astros' ability to develop and maintain elite starting pitching, a tradition that has defined their recent championship windows and continues to drive their pursuit of another World Series title.
Article Summary: Venezuelan left-hander framber valdez has a 1.72 era in his last six games. He has a winning record of 5-0, which is exactly what general manager dana brown hoped to find in her rotation this year. His hot streak gives the houston astros a stable pitching choice, which has helped overcome doubts about the team's rotation.

Article Title: NHL Trade Rumors: Marco Rossi could be traded after contract dispute with the Minnesota Wild
Article Text:
NHL Trade Rumors: Marco Rossi could be traded after contract dispute with the Minnesota Wild (Image via Getty)

NHL insider reveals Marco Rossi and Minnesota Wild are not on the same page





Marco Rossi trade and contract talks likely to heat up soon





Minnesota Wild young striker Marco Rossi might have some significant changes upcoming. On June 5, 2025, NHL insider Chris Johnston made important announcements during an episode of The Chris Johnston Show. His update gives a closer look at what‚Äôs happening between Marco Rossi and the team, especially as the offseason moves ahead.On June 5, 2025, during The Chris Johnston Show, hockey reporter Chris Johnston said that there is no agreement between Marco Rossi and the Minnesota Wild on what his next contract should be. Johnston explained that both sides have different ideas about what the deal should look like.The 22-year-old Austrian forward had a strong year, playing 82 games and scoring 21 goals with 19 assists. Still, the team and his camp have not been able to agree on a new contract. Johnston said, ‚ÄúThere isn‚Äôt a shared vision. They aren‚Äôt on the same page right now.‚ÄùBecause Marco Rossi is a restricted free agent, other NHL teams could try to sign him with an offer sheet‚Äîa type of contract offer that another team can give if the player and his current team haven‚Äôt reached a deal.Johnston also mentioned that the Wild are open to trading Rossi if the right deal comes up.This opens up many options for both the player and other teams.Also Read: Brock Nelson Eyes Minnesota Wild As Possible Homecoming In NHL Free Agency: Report As of now, the Minnesota Wild have not made any official statements. However, team insiders say general manager Bill Guerin has been in contact with Rossi‚Äôs agent. Talks have not moved forward, and there is now real trade interest coming in from other NHL teams.Chris Johnston said on his show, ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs a good young player. He could get an offer sheet, or he could be moved in a trade. There are options on the table.‚ÄùIn 2020, Wild picked Marco Rossi ninth overall. Displaying exceptional growth in his position, he began full-time work with the team during the NHL season of 2023‚Äì24.
Article Summary: Nhl insider reveals marco rossi and minnesota wild are not on the same page right now. The 22-year-old austrian forward had a strong year, playing 82 games and scoring 21 goals with 19 assists. As of now, the minnesota wild have not made any official statements.

Article Title: Stars fire Pete DeBoer as questions swirl around his handling of Jake Oettinger
Article Text:
Stars fire Pete DeBoer as questions swirl around his handling of Jake Oettinger (Image Source: Getty Images)





Dallas fires Pete DeBoer after third straight Western Conference finals loss





Jake Oettinger benching raises questions before DeBoer‚Äôs firing





The Dallas Stars made a big move just days after their season ended. Fans were left wondering what would happen next. On Friday, June 6, the team finally answered that question. Dallas fires Pete DeBoer after their third straight Western Conference finals loss. The decision followed a disappointing finish in the Stanley Cup Playoffs. But the reasons go deeper than just losing a series.The Dallas Stars announced on Friday, June 6, 2025, that they have fired head coach Pete DeBoer. The team made the news public eight days after being eliminated from the Stanley Cup Playoffs. The Stars lost to the Edmonton Oilers in the Western Conference Finals.The series ended in Game 5, held in Edmonton. The Oilers won the game 6-3. That defeat marked the third straight year Dallas failed to reach the Stanley Cup Final. DeBoer had one year left on his contract when he was let go.Jim Nill, general manager of the Stars, said in a statement, ‚ÄúAfter careful consideration, we believe that a new voice is needed in our locker room to push us closer to our goal of winning the Stanley Cup.‚ÄùPete DeBoer had coached the team for three seasons.He led Dallas to strong regular seasons, but the team could not get past the Conference Finals in each of those years.Also Read: Mason Marchment Trade Rumors Heat Up As Dallas Stars Look To Clear Cap Space On the first two shots in Game 5 on May 31, Stars goalie Jake Oettinger gave up two goals. The Rogers Place in Edmonton, Alberta, housed that game. Early in the game, Pete DeBoer chose to replace him with backup goalie Casey DeSmith. The change astonished a lot of people.After the loss, Pete DeBoer said, ‚ÄúAny time you pull a goalie, the reason is to try and spark your group. We talked about playing with the lead. But we were down 2-0 right away.‚ÄùDeBoer also mentioned Oettinger‚Äôs past struggles against the Oilers. He noted that the goalie had lost six of his last seven playoff games to Edmonton.Two days later, during the team‚Äôs season-ending media session, Pete DeBoer again defended his decision. He told reporters he was still a big fan of Oettinger, though he hadn‚Äôt spoken to him since the game.Jake Oettinger, 26, also spoke during that media session. He said, ‚ÄúIf I make one or two of those saves, I‚Äôm still playing. My job is to stop the puck.‚ÄùJake Oettinger recently signed an eight-year contract that begins next season.The Stars have not shared further details about DeBoer‚Äôs firing or any conflict with players.
Article Summary: Stars fire pete deboer as questions swirl around his handling of jake oettinger. Stars lost to the edmonton oilers in the western conference finals. That defeat marked the third straight year dallas failed to reach the stanley cup final. Jim nill, general manager of the stars, said in a statement, ‚Äúwe believe that a new voice is needed in our locker room.‚Äù

Article Title: Golden State Warriors‚Äô Draymond Green‚Äôs honest take on owner Joe Lacob‚Äôs Durant comments and Luka Doncic‚Äôs unexpected trade news
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Golden State Warriors ' reaction to Luka Doncic's trade

Draymond Green on Mavs Trading Luka to the Lakers, His Mom Talking Trash & Guarding Wembanyama





Draymond Green had quite the night at the Warriors' charity tournament. There were whispers about Kevin Durant making a comeback, which got everyone excited, but then a trade announcement hit that surprised everyone. Luka Doncic's major move changed the game and highlighted how unpredictable NBA trades really are.During the Golden State Warriors' yearly charity poker tournament on February 1, 2025, at the Chase Center, Draymond Green went through a rollercoaster of feelings. At first, Warriors owner Joe Lacob dropped a hint about a possible reunion with Kevin Durant, saying, ‚ÄúDraymond, I think we‚Äôre gonna get Kevin Durant; it‚Äôs right there at the finish line; it‚Äôs happening.‚Äù This sparked excitement in Green, who had previously played alongside Durant during the Warriors' championship runs.However, the situation took an unexpected turn when Stephen Curry, amidst the tournament, exclaimed, ‚ÄúDid you see the trade?!‚Äù Green, still trying to wrap his head around the Durant news, was shocked to find out that Luka Doncic had been traded from the Dallas Mavericks to the Los Angeles Lakers for Anthony Davis.This news left Green momentarily at a loss for words, as he had been expecting a completely different outcome.People were very excited when Doncic‚Äôs trade was announced and this certainly impacted the Warriors. The footage from the charity event showed both Green and Curry being really surprised by what happened.Green was heard saying, "What?!" over and over as he tried to wrap his head around the surprising turn of events. Curry looked just as stunned, his mouth hanging open and his phone call cut short by his shock. The vibe in the room changed from fun to a shared feeling of astonishment, as everyone dealt with the weight of the trade.In the aftermath of the trade, Green took to his podcast, "The Draymond Green Show," to share his thoughts. He expressed his belief that the trade would have a significant impact on the NBA landscape, stating, ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs one of the biggest impacts.‚Äù Green pointed out the league's unpredictability, mentioning that huge trades can alter team dynamics and strategies significantly. He also recognized the emotional strain on players involved in these high-profile trades, acknowledging the hurdles they must overcome to adapt to new surroundings and expectations.Also Read: Savannah James‚Äô honest confession: The one thing LeBron James has never done for her It made Draymond Green realize that the league keeps changing and truths and rumors often meet. Whenever teams change their strategies and add or subtract players, Green has to be prepared to deal with anything the next challenge brings. When Luka Doncic joined the Los Angeles Lakers, he not only changed his own career but also created fresh tales and competing teams in the NBA.
Article Summary: Luka doncic was traded from the dallas mavericks to the los angeles lakers for anthony davis. Draymond green was at the golden state warriors' charity poker tournament. Green was shocked to find out about the trade, as he had been expecting a different outcome. Green took to his podcast to talk about the nba's unpredictability.

Article Title: Olympic gold medalist Imane Khelif's medical report reveals she's 'biologically male'
Article Text:
Imane Khelif ‚Äôs medical report contradicts IOC‚Äôs official position

Image: ReduxxMag/ X.com)

Controversy around the Imane Khelif‚Äôs gold medal at Paris Olympic



IOC calls findings misinformation



Response of World Boxing

Fairness and safety concerns from athletes and federations



Ongoing debate on gender and sport eligibility





A leaked medical report from the 2023 World Championships has revealed that Olympic boxing champion Imane Khelifis biologically male, according to chromosome analysis. The report, made public just days after World Boxing ordered Khelif to undergo sex testing for eligibility in future female competitions, shows she has a male XY karyotype. This revelation challenges the International Olympic Committee‚Äôs (IOC) earlier dismissal of such tests and has intensified debate over fairness and safety in women‚Äôs boxing. The findings come amid ongoing controversy surrounding Khelif‚Äôs participation in women‚Äôs events, sparking calls for stricter verification procedures in sport.The report, published on the 3 Wire Sports website, states that Khelif‚Äôs chromosome analysis is ‚Äúabnormal‚Äù and confirms a male karyotype. It was conducted by Dr Lal PathLabs in New Delhi, a lab accredited by the American College of Pathologists and certified by the International Organisation for Standardisation. This directly challenges the IOC‚Äôs spokesperson Mark Adams, who had described such test results as ‚Äúad hoc‚Äù and ‚Äúnot legitimate‚Äù during a press conference at the Paris Olympics.The controversy surrounding Imane Khelif ‚Äôs Olympic gold medal run began as early as her first bout in Paris, where she faced Italy‚Äôs Angela Carini.Carini, an experienced and respected boxer, was visibly shaken during the match. Overwhelmed by Khelif‚Äôs strength and intensity, she appeared distressed and left the ring in tears after the fight, later telling media she had feared for her safety. The unease only deepened in the final bout, where Khelif defeated Taiwan‚Äôs Lin Yu-ting in a dominant display that many felt was physically one-sided. The power difference between the fighters drew sharp criticism, with commentators and athletes calling it ‚Äúuncomfortable to watch‚Äù and likening it to watching a man beat a woman in the ring. The moment became one of the most controversial of the Paris Games, fuelling an international debate over fairness and inclusion in women‚Äôs sport.IOC president Thomas Bach dismissed the report as part of a Russian-led misinformation campaign, citing ethical and financial issues within the International Boxing Association (IBA), which conducted the tests. Despite these claims, the legitimacy of the Indian lab‚Äôs certification has increased pressure on the IOC to clarify its position and respond to questions about Khelif‚Äôs eligibility.Following the leak, World Boxing has declared that Khelif must pass mandatory chromosome testing before competing in any future female events. The 26-year-old Olympic champion, who was allowed to compete in Paris due to her female passport status, has so far not provided evidence to confirm female chromosomes. World Boxing now requires all athletes over 18 in its competitions to undergo PCR genetic testing to verify their sex, a measure introduced in response to this controversy.The case has raised serious safety and fairness concerns within the boxing community. Opponents like Italy‚Äôs Angela Carini and Mexico‚Äôs Brianda Tamara have spoken out about the physical challenges they faced competing against Khelif. Latin American federations have been particularly vocal, urging that women‚Äôs competitions be restricted to athletes assigned female at birth, in order to protect fairness and athlete safety.The Khelif controversy highlights the complex and sensitive issues surrounding transgender and intersex athletes in competitive sport. It underscores the need for clear, consistent policies that balance inclusivity with fairness and safety. As governing bodies reassess their rules, the case remains a key example of the challenges faced in maintaining the integrity of women‚Äôs sports.The ongoing debate around Imane Khelif‚Äôs case brings to light just how complex and emotionally charged the conversation about gender and eligibility in sport has become. At the heart of it are real athletes ‚Äî women who train for years and step into the ring expecting fairness. Many feel blindsided and unheard when competing against opponents whose physical attributes raise legitimate concerns about safety and equality. This isn‚Äôt about exclusion, but about protecting hard-won opportunities for women in sport. Khelif‚Äôs story reminds us that governing bodies must act transparently, thoughtfully, and with empathy for all athletes involved.
Article Summary: Imane khelif ‚Äôs medical report contradicts ioc‚Äôs official position. Leaked report shows she has a male xy karyotype. This revelation challenges the international olympic committee's (ioc) earlier dismissal of such tests. Many feel blindsided and unheard when competing against opponents whose physical attributes raise legitimate concerns about safety and equality.

Article Title: IPL 2025 Final RCB vs PBKS match: Shark Tank judge Anupam Mittal says Glad our forces are‚Ä¶
Article Text:
IPL 2025 Closing Ceremony: Time and other things to know

IPL 2025‚Äôs Robo-Dog Cheerleader Champak: The Cutest Tech Upgrade in Cricket!

Shark Tank judge and People Group founder Anupam Mittal has praised Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) for dedicating IPL 2025 closing ceremony to the armed forces. Taking to microblogging platform X (formerly Twitter), Mittal wrote: ‚ÄúGlad our forces are getting the respect they deserve‚Äù. He also urged the organisers to honour victims and their families.‚ÄúWe should also honour the victims & their families,‚Äù he wrote, tagging official Twitter handles of BCCI and IPL.The closing ceremony on 18th edition of Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 will be held at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. The closing ceremony will begin at 6:00 pm.BCCI is expected to bring some prominent singers on board for a musical evening ahead of the IPL 2025 grand finale. The ceremony may feature a performance by the military bands.BCCI secretary Devajit Saikia told TOI ‚ÄúThe BCCI salutes the bravery, courage, and selfless service of our armed forces, whose heroic efforts under Operation Sindoor continue to protect and inspire the nation. As a tribute, we have decided to dedicate the closing ceremony to the armed forces and honour our heroes. While cricket remains a national passion, there is nothing greater than the nation and its sovereignty, integrity, and security of our country. We are proud of our armed forces and thankful to them for ensuring our security and safety at all times‚Äù.‚ÄúWe have sent out invitations to senior armed forces officials for the ceremony. We have also decided to dedicate a few stands in the stadium during the match for the armed forces personnel. The closing ceremony will feature some patriotic songs being played out. It will be a solemn occasion,‚Äù Saikia added.
Article Summary: Shark tank judge and people group founder anupam mittal has praised board of control for cricket in india (bcci) for dedicating ipl 2025 closing ceremony to the armed forces. Mittal urged the organisers to honour victims and their families. The closing ceremony on 18th edition of indian premier league (ipl) 2025 will be held at the narendra modi stadium in ahmedabad.

Article Title: Jeff Bezos‚Äô yacht party to Odell Beckham Jr.‚Äôs art bash: F1 Monaco gave fans a glimpse into the luxury lane
Article Text:
RD Grand Prix: Jeff Bezos and a superyacht extravaganza

FRI&NDS by Odell Beckham Jr.: Art, music, and culture onboard





Charles Leclerc launches Ferrari capsule at Nikki Beach Monte Carlo



Redefining luxury at Monaco Grand Prix 2025

The 2025 Formula 1 Monaco Grand Prix weekend was a dazzling blend of racing, music, art, and luxury. As McLaren‚Äôs Lando Norris took his maiden victory on the iconic Monte Carlo circuit, the event became much more than just a race. Celebrities and elite guests including Jeff Bezos, Lauren Sanchez, Dua Lipa, Sofia Vergara, and Odell Beckham Jr. turned Monaco into the ultimate playground of glitz and glamour. From lavish yacht parties to exclusive art events, Monaco gave fans an extraordinary peek into the high life beyond the track.One of the weekend‚Äôs most talked-about activities was the debut of the RD Grand Prix, a three-day superyacht experience at Port Hercule. Hosting around a hundred VIPs, the 180-foot yacht combined live music, fine dining, and trackside viewing of the race. Robin Thicke opened with a private concert, followed by a surprise Sunday night set from DJ Rampa, who premiered new speakers to an electrified crowd including Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sanchez.Created by Ben Biscotti and Sylvain Bitton, RD Grand Prix was designed to mix tech billionaires, royalty, and fashion icons with racing fans in a setting of unrivaled luxury. Guests enjoyed champagne on the rooftop bar, relaxed in an outdoor hot tub, shopped fashion pop-ups, and dined on cuisine by Michelin-starred chef Marc Forgione. Sponsors like RUMOR Ros√© and Lewis Hamilton‚Äôs Almave spirit added to the upscale vibe. Biscotti says the goal is to ‚Äúredefine luxury and experiential hospitality‚Äù by crafting unforgettable moments that blend entertainment and exclusivity.Just a short walk from the RD Grand Prix, NFL star Odell Beckham Jr. hosted his FRI&NDS activation aboard his private yacht. This event combined music, art, and philanthropy in an intimate, lively atmosphere. Guests like Devin Booker and Chanel Iman mingled as DJ HoneyLuv and Paperwater provided live music, while a curated art exhibit by Lisbon‚Äôs Underdogs Gallery showcased works by street artist Alexandre Farto (aka ‚ÄúVhils‚Äù).The highlight was a collaborative concrete carving auctioned off by Beckham and Vhils, with proceeds benefiting Iminente‚Äôs Bairros project. This initiative empowers underserved Portuguese communities through art and education. Launched at the Super Bowl earlier this year, FRI&NDS aims to celebrate and support creative talent through cultural events tied to major sports and entertainment moments.Formula 1 driver Charles Leclerc also made a splash during the weekend, debuting a new capsule clothing line with Ferrari Style at Nikki Beach Monte Carlo. The rooftop venue offered stunning views of both the Mediterranean and the race‚Äôs famous Fairmont Hairpin. Leclerc mingled with fans as Ferrari‚Äôs signature red branding adorned the club in celebration of Nikki Beach‚Äôs 10th anniversary.This collaboration added a fashionable edge to the Grand Prix festivities and highlighted how Monaco continues to blend sport with luxury lifestyle in unique ways.The Monaco Grand Prix has always been synonymous with luxury and exclusivity, but this year‚Äôs events took it to new heights. From Jeff Bezos‚Äô star-studded yacht party to Odell Beckham Jr.‚Äôs fusion of art and philanthropy, and Charles Leclerc‚Äôs stylish launch, Monaco 2025 was about more than racing. It was a celebration of culture, community, and elite experiences.Event producers Biscotti and Bitton have set the bar high for future activations, with their next major event, Ros√© Day Los Angeles, coming up in June. For fans and celebrities alike, Monaco continues to offer an unparalleled glimpse into the luxury lane, blending adrenaline, artistry, and opulence in one unforgettable weekend.
Article Summary: The 2025 formula 1 monaco grand prix weekend was a dazzling blend of racing, music, art, and luxury. Celebrities and elite guests including jeff bezos, lauren sanchez, dua lipa, sofia vergara, and odell beckham jr. turned monaco into the ultimate playground of glitz and glamour.

Article Title: India tour of England: Team India head coach Gautam Gambhir speaks on Shreyas Iyer omission, says 'anyone can be called if ... '
Article Text:
Shreyas Iyer of India (Photo by Stu Forster/Getty Images)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Was it right to leave out Shreyas Iyer from the Test squad despite his IPL form? Yes, red-ball form matters more No, he deserved a spot

Virat Kohli's love for 'dhaba' food, priority for family & more | RCB bus driver shares stories

India Squad:

England Squad:

Test Series Schedule:

1st Test: England v India, 20-24 June 2025, Headingley, Leeds

2nd Test: England v India, 2-6 July 2025, Edgbaston, Birmingham

3rd Test: England v India, 10-14 July 2025, Lord‚Äôs, London

4th Test: England v India, 23-27 July 2025, Emirates Old Trafford, Manchester

5th Test: England v India, 31 July-4 August 2025, Kia Oval, London





NEW DELHI: India‚Äôs red-ball setup has officially entered a new era. Shubman Gill will lead the team in the upcoming five-Test series in England, with Rishabh Pant named as vice-captain.The squad selection signals a strong shift towards youth and performance-based picks. Karun Nair‚Äôs return after eight years stands out, rewarding domestic resilience after being dropped despite a historic triple century in 2017.Addressing the tough decisions, India head coach Gautam Gambhir, when asked about Shreyas Iyer's omission from the India squad, emphasized meritocracy.‚ÄúAnyone can be called if they are in good form. We can only pick 18.
